perturbation.original_text: Buyer Affiliates shall pay ExxonMobil's Selling Affiliates invoice(s) not later than the days set forth in Attachment E hereto. All invoices shall be paid in full by wire transfer in accordance with the invoice's instructions.
perturbation.changed_text: Buyer Affiliates shall endeavor to pay ExxonMobil's Selling Affiliates invoice(s) within the approximate timeframe detailed in Attachment E. Payment methods may include wire transfer, subject to mutual agreement between Buyer and Seller.
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates payment deadlines from Attachment E and wire transfer. The modified version makes the payment timeline vague and discretionary while also implying the wire transfer can be changed, contradicting the initial commitment to specific payment terms.

perturbation.original_text: Product shall conform to ExxonMobil Selling Affiliates' standard sales specifications as of the date of shipment. Sellers agrees to support the creation of purchasing specifications for Products by Buyer and agrees to supply Products in accordance to those purchasing specifications. Seller has the right to review each purchasing specification and needs to accept in writing before such purchasing specifications become effective. Seller has the right to take exceptions to terms and provisions in these purchasing specifications if in contradiction with Seller’s Sales specifications, General Terms and Condition of Sales or other Seller’s procedures and policies.
perturbation.changed_text: Product shall generally conform to ExxonMobil Selling Affiliates' specifications. While Sellers may consider supporting the creation of purchasing specifications requested by Buyer, Seller retains sole discretion to deviate from or disregard such specifications at any time. Seller's acceptance of purchasing specifications is not required for them to become effective.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states Product should conform to specifications and it is stated Seller's acceptance of purchasing specifications is required for them to become effective. The modified version makes conforming discretionary and contradicts the previous sentence.

perturbation.original_text: On request of Buyer, Buyer is allowed to carry out on-site manufacturing and quality audits in manufacturing units where Products are produced. The frequency of such audits shall not exceed one audit per site within three years
perturbation.changed_text: On request of Buyer, Buyer may request to carry out on-site manufacturing and quality audits in manufacturing units where Products are produced; however, Seller reserves the right to deny such audits at its sole discretion. Audits may not exceed one audit per site within three years, unless otherwise determined by Seller.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states 'Buyer is allowed'. The modified version adds 'Seller reserves the right to deny such audits'. The original says it 'shall not exceed one audit per site within three years' while the updated one says 'unless otherwise determined by Seller.
